incident.description: Diagnostics: [conf.metadata-base-instance.root-element-success-en] 1 root element MD_Metadata found. [conf.metadata-base-instance.root-element-success-fr] 1 élément(s) racine(s) MD_Metadata identifié(s).

Diagnostics: [conf.metadata-base-instance.scope-name-failure-en] Specify a name for the metadata scope (required if the scope code is not "dataset"). [conf.metadata-base-instance.scope-name-failure-fr] Préciser la description du domaine d'application (car le document décrit une ressource qui n'est pas un "jeu de données").

Diagnostics: [conf.metadata-base-instance.create-date-failure-en] Specify a creation date for the metadata record (MD_Metadata/dateInfo... with CI_DateTypeCode/@codeListValue='creation'). [conf.metadata-base-instance.create-date-failure-fr] Specify a creation date for the metadata record (MD_Metadata/dateInfo... with CI_DateTypeCode/@codeListValue='creation').
